verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> went <WH1980> and spoke <WH1696> <WH853> these <WH428> words <WH1697> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> Israel. <WH3478>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, I <WH595> am a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> this day; <WH3117> I can <WH3201> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> go out <WH3318> and come in: <WH935> also the LORD <WH3068> hath said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Thou shalt not <WH3808> go over <WH5674> <WH853> this <WH2088> Jordan. <WH3383>

The LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> he <WH1931> will go over <WH5674> before <WH6440> thee, and he <WH1931> will destroy <WH8045> <WH853> these <WH428> nations <WH1471> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee, and thou shalt possess <WH3423> them: and Joshua, <WH3091> he <WH1931> shall go over <WH5674> before <WH6440> thee, as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath said. <WH1696>

And the LORD <WH3068> shall do <WH6213> unto them as <WH834> he did <WH6213> to Sihon <WH5511> and to Og, <WH5747> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> and unto the land <WH776> of them, whom <WH834> <WH853> he destroyed. <WH8045>

And the LORD <WH3068> shall give them up <WH5414> before your face, <WH6440> that ye may do <WH6213> unto them according unto all <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I have commanded <WH6680> you.

Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage, <WH553> fear <WH3372> not, <WH408> nor <WH408> be afraid <WH6206> of <WH4480> <WH6440> them: for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> he <WH1931> it is that doth go <WH1980> with <WH5973> thee; he will not <WH3808> fail <WH7503> thee, nor <WH3808> forsake <WH5800> thee.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto Joshua, <WH3091> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage: <WH553> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> must go <WH935> with <WH854> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> unto <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them; and thou <WH859> shalt cause them to inherit <WH5157> it.

And the LORD, <WH3068> he <WH1931> it is that doth go <WH1980> before <WH6440> thee; he <WH1931> will be <WH1961> with thee, <WH5973> he will not <WH3808> fail <WH7503> thee, neither <WH3808> forsake <WH5800> thee: fear <WH3372> not, <WH3808> neither <WH3808> be dismayed. <WH2865>

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> <WH853> this <WH2063> law, <WH8451> and delivered <WH5414> it unto <WH413> the priests <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> which bore <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> and unto <WH413> all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> them, saying, <WH559> At the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of every seven <WH7651> years, <WH8141> in the solemnity <WH4150> of the year <WH8141> of release, <WH8059> in the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles, <WH5521>

When all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> is come <WH935> to appear <WH7200> <WH853> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which <WH834> he shall choose, <WH977> thou shalt read <WH7121> <WH853> this <WH2063> law <WH8451> before <WH5048> all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> in their hearing. <WH241>

Gather the people together, <WH6950> <WH853> <WH5971> men, <WH376> and women, <WH802> and children, <WH2945> and thy stranger <WH1616> that <WH834> is within thy gates, <WH8179> that <WH4616> they may hear, <WH8085> and that <WH4616> they may learn, <WH3925> and fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law: <WH8451>

And that their children, <WH1121> which <WH834> have not <WH3808> known <WH3045> any thing, may hear, <WH8085> and learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> as long as <WH3605> <WH3117> <WH834> ye <WH859> live <WH2416> in <WH5921> the land <WH127> whither <WH834> <WH8033> ye <WH859> go over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan <WH3383> to possess <WH3423> it.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Behold, <WH2005> thy days <WH3117> approach <WH7126> that thou must die: <WH4191> call <WH7121> <WH853> Joshua, <WH3091> and present yourselves <WH3320> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> that I may give him a charge. <WH6680> And Moses <WH4872> and Joshua <WH3091> went, <WH1980> and presented themselves <WH3320> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the tabernacle <WH168> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud: <WH6051> and the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> stood <WH5975> over <WH5921> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle. <WH168>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Behold, <WH2009> thou shalt sleep <WH7901> with <WH5973> thy fathers; <WH1> and this <WH2088> people <WH5971> will rise up, <WH6965> and go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> the gods <WH430> of the strangers <WH5236> of the land, <WH776> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they <WH1931> go <WH935> to be among <WH7130> them, and will forsake <WH5800> me, and break <WH6565> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I have made <WH3772> with <WH854> them.

Then my anger <WH639> shall be kindled <WH2734> against them in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> and I will forsake <WH5800> them, and I will hide <WH5641> my face <WH6440> from <WH4480> them, and they shall be <WH1961> devoured, <WH398> and many <WH7227> evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> shall befall <WH4672> them; so that they will say <WH559> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> Are not <WH3808> these <WH428> evils <WH7451> come upon <WH4672> us, because <WH5921> <WH3588> our God <WH430> is not <WH369> among <WH7130> us?

And I <WH595> will surely hide <WH5641> <WH5641> my face <WH6440> in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> for <WH5921> all <WH3605> the evils <WH7451> which <WH834> they shall have wrought, <WH6213> in that <WH3588> they are turned <WH6437> unto <WH413> other <WH312> gods. <WH430>

Now <WH6258> therefore write <WH3789> <WH853> ye this <WH2063> song <WH7892> for you, and teach <WH3925> it <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> put <WH7760> it in their mouths, <WH6310> that <WH4616> this <WH2063> song <WH7892> may be <WH1961> a witness <WH5707> for me against the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

For <WH3588> when I shall have brought <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH127> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers, <WH1> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey; <WH1706> and they shall have eaten <WH398> and filled themselves, <WH7646> and waxen fat; <WH1878> then will they turn <WH6437> unto <WH413> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and serve <WH5647> them, and provoke <WH5006> me, and break <WH6565> <WH853> my covenant. <WH1285>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> many <WH7227> evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> are befallen <WH4672> them, that this <WH2063> song <WH7892> shall testify <WH6030> against <WH6440> them as a witness; <WH5707> for <WH3588> it shall not <WH3808> be forgotten <WH7911> out of the mouths <WH4480> <WH6310> of their seed: <WH2233> for <WH3588> I know <WH3045> <WH853> their imagination <WH3336> which <WH834> they <WH1931> go about, <WH6213> even now, <WH3117> before <WH2962> I have brought <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore. <WH7650>
Moses <WH4872> therefore wrote <WH3789> <WH853> this <WH2063> song <WH7892> the same <WH1931> day, <WH3117> and taught <WH3925> it <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And he gave <WH6680> <WH853> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> a charge, and said, <WH559> Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage: <WH553> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> shalt bring <WH935> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> unto them: and I <WH595> will be <WH1961> with <WH5973> thee.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Moses <WH4872> had made an end <WH3615> of writing <WH3789> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law <WH8451> in <WH5921> a book, <WH5612> until <WH5704> they were finished, <WH8552>
That Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> the Levites, <WH3881> which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>

Take <WH3947> <WH853> this <WH2088> book <WH5612> of the law, <WH8451> and put <WH7760> it in the side <WH4480> <WH6654> of the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> that it may be <WH1961> there <WH8033> for a witness <WH5707> against thee.

For <WH3588> I <WH595> know <WH3045> <WH853> thy rebellion, <WH4805> and thy stiff <WH7186> neck: <WH6203> behold, <WH2005> while I am yet <WH5750> alive <WH2416> with <WH5973> you this day, <WH3117> ye have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the LORD; <WH3068> and how <WH3588> much more <WH637> after <WH310> my death? <WH4194>

Gather <WH6950> unto <WH413> me <WH853> all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of your tribes, <WH7626> and your officers, <WH7860> that I may speak <WH1696> <WH853> these <WH428> words <WH1697> in their ears, <WH241> and call <WH5749> <WH853> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to record against them.

For <WH3588> I know <WH3045> that after <WH310> my death <WH4194> ye will utterly corrupt <WH7843> <WH7843> yourselves, and turn aside <WH5493> from <WH4480> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I have commanded <WH6680> you; and evil <WH7451> will befall <WH7122> you in the latter <WH319> days; <WH3117> because <WH3588> ye will do <WH6213> <WH853> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> to provoke him to anger <WH3707> through the work <WH4639> of your hands. <WH3027>

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> in the ears <WH241> of all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> of Israel <WH3478> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> song, <WH7892> until <WH5704> they were ended. <WH8552>
